question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions. During the PAST TWO WEEKS:
… have you been exposed to someone likely to have Coronavirus/COVID-19? (check all that apply)
option_text: Yes someone with positive test, Yes someone with medical diagnosis but not test, Yes someone with possible symptoms but no diagnosis by doctor, Not to my knowledge

question_text: … have you been suspected of having Coronavirus/COVID-19 infection?
option_text: Yes has positive test, Yes medical diagnosis but no test, Yes have had some possible symptoms but no diagnosis by doctor, No symptoms or signs

question_text: … have you had any of the following symptoms? (check all that apply)
option_text: Fever, Cough, Shortness of breadth, Sore throat, Fatigue, Loss of taste of smell, Eye infection, Other

question_text: … has anyone in your family been diagnosed with Coronavirus/COVID-19?(check all that apply)
option_text: Yes member of household, Yes non-household member, No

question_text: … have any of the following happened to your family members because of Coronavirus/COVID-19? (check all that apply)
option_text: Fallen ill physically, Hospitalized, Put into self-quranting with symptoms, Put into self-qurantine without symptoms, Lostor been laid off from job, Reduced ability to earn money, Passed away, None of the above

question_text: … how worried have you been about being infected?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: … how worried have you been about friends or family being infected?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: … how worried have you been about your physical health being influenced by Coronavirus/COVID-19?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: … how worried have you been about your Mental/Emotional health being influenced by Coronavirus/COVID-19?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately, Very, Extremely

question_text: How much are you reading, or talking about Coronavirus/COVID-19?
option_text: Never, Rarely, Occasionally, Often, Most of the time

question_text: Has the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area led to any positive changes in your life?
If answered "Only a few" or "Some"  to question "Has the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area led to any positive changes in your life?" please specify:
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
